title: RIMJHIM SAXENA
text:
My name is Rimjhim Saxena (Pronounced : Rim-Jim Sax-éna)
I am a PhD Candidate in Economics at University of Colorado, Boulder. I like working at the intersection of Climate + Labor + Development, preferably with a good coffee.





Environmental Economics
Labor Economics
Climate Change Adaptation
